name: WP Signals
author: Signal Resiliency

sections.description:
Become a data-driven marketer. Setup your Facebook pixels in less than a minute with our powerful Wizard. Try it out now for free.

Tracking Pixels and 3rd Party Cookies are at Risk

Browsers are moving away from 3rd party cookies and regulations such as GDPR and CCPA are following suite. Tracking return customers and impact of marketing spend will become increasingly difficult in a cookieless world, directly impacting marketing budgets and company bottom lines.

The WP Signals Plugin leverages both the Facebook JavaScript Pixel and Conversions API to mitigate data loss and optimization Facebook algorithms.

RESULT:

Facebook Advertisers can expect 15%-35% return on ad spend!

Easy Setup and Free Support

WP SIGNALS plugin includes built-in support for:

  • WOOCOMMERCE INTEGRATION
  • CONTACT FORM 7 INTEGRATION
  • FORMIDABLE INTEGRATION
  • MAILCHIMP INTEGRATION

FIRE YOUR CUSTOM EVENTS:

Easily configure your own events and send them to Facebook.

SUPPORT

Please contact us directly for support and questions.

https://signalresiliency.com/contact/
sections.installation:
Just install this plugin as you would do any other – either through WordPress plugin directory, or by uploading the zip
in your WP admin panel.

This plugin is free to use, and contains a number of awesome features. Those include integrations with other
WordPress plugins, setting up server-side events, and powerful analytics tools.
sections.faq:
What is a Facebook Pixel?

A Facebook pixel helps you measure customer actions, build audiences and unlock optimization tools for your ads.

How can I add my first pixel?

The simplest way to add a FB pixel with the WP Signals plugin is to use our powerful wizard, which you can access on the “Settings” tab.

What is the Conversions API?

The Conversions API allows advertisers to send web events from their servers directly to Facebook, skipping any roadblocks set by browsers and ad blockers. WP Signals supports all features from the Conversions API.
sections.changelog:
2.0.0

  • Enable all features for free.

1.0.1

  • Send action_source as requested by new Facebook guidelines.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
